sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const AddWatch = () => { const [watchData, setWatchData] = useState({ watch_name: '', thumbnail: null, brands: '', price: '', discount: '', gender: '', dial_type: '', dial_colour: '', dial_shape: '', style: '', strap_material: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setWatchData({ ...watchData, [name]: value }); }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; setWatchData({ ...watchData, thumbnail: file }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(); for (let key in watchData) { formData.append(key, watchData[key]); } try { const response = await axios.post('/dashboard/add_watch/', formData, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' } }); console.log('Watch added successfully:', response.data); // You can perform additional actions after adding the watch } catch (error) { console.error('Error adding watch:', error); } }; return (
); }; export default AddWatch;
